item.title: Teminal Not Functioning Error
item.description: Symptoms try and run a command and get this: WARNING: terminal is not fully functional Cure It is to do with your TERM enviroment setting. Running echo $TERM will return something like screen-256color this needs to be changed. I have had success with the following: export TERM=ansi You should also Change this in your .bashrc/.zshrc if after a reboot you get the same issue. References http://superuser.com/questions/575844/warning-terminal-is-not-fully-functional
